name: interp data
desc: The Interp data module interpolates nodal data from a field to either an equal or lower dimension field.

properties.name: Switch Property View
properties.desc: Edit the renderable (red) port properties for the module.

properties.name: Remove Nodes Outside Volume
properties.desc: The RemoveNodesOutsideVolume control tells the algorithm what do with nodes from the Input Destination Field that fall outside of the coordinate range of the Input Data Field.

properties.name: Data To Interpolate
properties.desc: The Data To Interpolate control is used to select which scalar data component is to be interpolated onto the surface or line of interest.
